verdict: FORWARD-VALIDATED-S329 (n=7 sessions, 0-2 organic/10s at K>58k). Prediction holds.
open: (1) Extend to 10+ sessions for stronger power
(2) Test: does compaction event (F105) re-open organic correction window?
